headline: Why Micron Stock Is Plummeting Today
summary: Micron Technology (NASDAQ: MU) stock is getting hit with big sell-offs Thursday.  At the same point in the day's trading, the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite were down 5.4% and 6.2%, respectively.  Micron skyrocketed yesterday after President Donald Trump announced a 90-day pause on his administration's reciprocal tariff policy for almost all countries.
